oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Trace elements in rye - comparison of organic and conventional cultivation
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Eurola, Merja
Hietaniemi, Veli
Niskanen, Markku
Laine, Antti
Vuorinen, Martti
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Crop husbandry
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The trials included comparison of four rye cultivars grown in organic and conventional farming systems at three locations during 1999-2002.
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: Eurola, Merja; Hietaniemi, Veli; Niskanen, Markku; Laine, Antti and Vuorinen, Martti (2003) Trace elements in rye - comparison of organic and conventional cultivation. Paper at: NJF's 22nd congress "Nordic agriculture in global perspective", Turku, Finland, July 1-4, 2003.
